title: Huawei Revenue Takes Hit in Chips Business
itunes:title: Huawei Revenue Takes Hit in Chips Business
description:
Andy Purdy, Chief Security Officer at Huawei Technologies USA, discusses the company's efforts to establish its own chipmaking operations to circumvent U.S. bans particularly in semiconductors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
